item.title: projects/
item.description: Here is a list of my favorite programming projects: project koann! AI plays Flappy Bird Simplr Car Detection with OpenCV For more of my work, visit my GitHub profile.

item.title: skills/
item.description: What programming languages do you know? I’m programming in Python for over 3 years now, plan on learning GoLang. What about cyber-security? I’ve started learning about cybersecurity in 2019. and have been doing it ever since. During that period I’ve conducted a few blackbox penetration tests for local IT companies which were all successful in securing their web applications. Currently interning as a penetration tester and doing bug bounties in my free time.

item.title: whoami/
item.description: I am a cyber-security and programming enthusiast. Currently an interning as a penetration tester in a local IT company. I do bug bounties on HackerOne and post my programming projects on GitHub. For more information/CV, contact me: belusik@proton.me
